name: LM Beastmaster Head Armor
description: The LM Beastmaster Head Armor is part of the LM Beastmaster Armor Set , which can be unlocked in the Workshop on the Space Station and is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs to Mounts and tamed creatures.
